import React from 'react' function Mail() { return (

Mail Us

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

  • Phone: +1234 567 893
  • Email: info@example.com
) } export default Mail
